clues.name: Encrypted Note
clues.description: A crumpled piece of paper with the binary code: 01001000 01000101 01001100 01010000.

clues.name: UV Flashlight
clues.description: Reveals hidden ink on the walls. It shows the number '472'.

clues.name: Rusty Key
clues.description: An old iron key. It might fit the server cabinet.

puzzles.name: Firewall Lock
puzzles.description: The screen asks for a 4-digit PIN. Hint: Look at the wall with the UV light.

puzzles.name: Binary Riddle
puzzles.description: Decipher the note to find the password.
